title: John and Betty's Scotch history visit,
author: Williamson, Margaret. [from old catalog]
snippet: ^* It's the jail, John," said Mrs. Pitt, much amused ; ' ^ but really I 'm not surprised that you mistook it for another castle. Here 's the Royal High School, at the foot of the Calton Hill. That has an exceedingly interesting history, which I must sometime tell you more about.

title: John and Betty's Scotch history visit,
author: Williamson, Margaret. [from old catalog]
snippet: ^' He came to live at Holyrood Palace to study with Dr. Schmetz, then headmaster of the Royal High School. That isn't just like going to school there, of course.
